dataList.content:
- Coupons are always combinations of upper-case English alphabets and numbers.
- No same coupon can be registered more than once for the same account.
- Coupons past their expiry date cannot be registered.
- Repeated coupon code input failure within a short timeframe may restrict coupon code for a set amount of time.
This coupon has already been claimed.
This reward for that coupon has already been claimed by this account.
Repeated coupon code input failure. Coupon code input restricted until {0}.
